name: radhamedia
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: radha media
des: A 2 A Movie Skill works only when the user has an amazon developer account and Alexa device are the prerequisites required for the A 2 A Movie Skill. The purpose of A 2 A Movie skill is a complete encyclopedia about Ameerpet to America movie which deals with Cast, Crew, Director, Producer, Technicians, Music director worked in the movie. User start conversation with Alexa app by saying ''Alexa ask Radha Media'' and once Alexa replies with welcome message, user can ask the information like who is the director of the film, who is the producer of the film, who are the cast and crew for the film, who is the music director for the film, gallery, user can say ''launch first song'' to play the first song.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
